title: setting the user details
description: This event should emitted by the client to register and set user detail to the socket connection. With out this the server will not identify the user as valid user.
name: EventSetUser

title: listening for meeting pertained noifications
description: This event (userId ) has to be listened on the user's end to receive notification(create,edit,delete.reminder) from server.
name: EventMeetingNotification

title: listening to verifyUser
description: This event ("verifyUser") has to be listened on the user's end to verify user authentication. user will only be set as online user after verification of authentication token.
name: EventVerifyuser
